Class Cell

java.lang.Object
Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
a single cell of the board that contains information of is the cell revealed, if there is a mine or a flag in the cell, and what number should be displayed on the cell.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Cell()
    First constructor for cell class initializes isMine and isRevealed to false creates a new blank cell that isn't revealed
    Cell​(boolean mine)
    Second constructor for cell class initializes isMine to user preference creates either a blank cell or a mine cell isn't revealed

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getCount()
    accessor method for count
    boolean getIsFlag()
    is the cell flagged? can only be flagged if it is not revealed both mines and numbers can be flagged
    boolean getIsMine()
    returns if cell is a mine or not
    boolean getIsRevealed()
    accessor for isRevealed field
    void setCount​(int num)
    sets the field count to num
    void setIsFlag​(boolean flag)
    sets if the cell is flagged or not
    void setIsMine​(boolean mine)
    sets if current cell is a mine
    void setIsRevealed​(boolean revealed)
    sets current cell to revealed or not

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
